title: $:/plugins/BTC/resizer
author: BTC
name: Resizer
description:
TiddlyWiki Resizer Widget

A powerful and flexible resizer widget that enables interactive resizing of UI elements with support for multiple tiddlers, various CSS units, and calc() expressions.
readme:

<$button class="tc-btn-invisible" style="overflow: hidden;white-space: pre;width: 100%;" message="tm-open-external-window" param="https://burningtreec.github.io/resizer/">{{$:/core/images/home-button}} <$text text="https://burningtreec.github.io/resizer/"/></$button>

! TiddlyWiki Resizer Widget

A powerful and flexible resizer widget that enables interactive resizing of UI elements with support for multiple tiddlers, various CSS units, and calc() expressions.

[[Talk TiddlyWiki: YAR - yet another resizer|https://talk.tiddlywiki.org/t/yar-yet-another-resizer/13060]]
